Comments :
Remake of 1963 classic thriller "Charade" starring Cary Grant and 
Audrey Hepburn.
A young woman (Thandie Newton) in Paris is about to divorce her husband 
when she discovers... he&#039;s dead; and all their money is gone. She meets 
a mysterious man (Mark Wahlberg), who tells her that the money was really 
his, and he wants it back, seemingly convinced that she&#039;s hiding the cash. 
Meanwhile, more people end up dead...
